original_title: Heavy showers in several areas today (30)
original_body_lines: The Department of Meteorology said the showery weather condition is expected to enhance over the island due to an atmospheric disturbance over the South-east Bay of Bengal Sea area.
The Met. Department predicted showers or thundershowers in the Northern, North-Central, and Eastern provinces, with showers or thundershowers in other provinces after 01.00 p.m.
The Department predicted heavy showers of about 100mm in the Northern, Eastern, Central, and Uva provinces.
